author: alexssd7fp
content:
The uncle rate is statistically different, but it doesn't mean it happens just because of the "attack" everyone is talking about now. It is one of many shady things F2Pool is doing.

Based on what I saw, the most that contributed to the low uncle rate is a suspected cartel between Chinese pools that prioritizes their own blocks when choosing what block to uncle. Two pools I'm 95% sure are part of this are F2Pool and Poolin.

F2Pool is also running several other attacks on mainnet for months, if not years. I also discovered that they are mining sister blocks when there is high MEV to steal the rewards from honest miners.
